name: Zaple Global Technologies LLC FZ
description: Zaple is an all‑in‑one WhatsApp Business platform that helps companies turn messaging into a revenue‑generating, customer‑delighting channel. Zaple unifies marketing broadcasts, AI‑driven chatbots, and a role‑based team inbox in a single, scalable SaaS. From automated campaigns with smart retry logic to rich analytics and industry‑specific add‑ons (property, club management, events), Zaple cuts operational overhead and unlocks personalised customer journeys.
